Field.name: TaxTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of tax

Field.name: TaxJurisdictionCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the source of the data used in tax jurisdiction code

Field.name: TaxExemptCode
Field.comment: Code identifying exemption status from sales and use tax

Field.name: RelationshipCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the relationship between entities

Field.name: DollarBasisForPercent
Field.comment: Dollar basis to be used in the percent calculation of the allowance, charge or tax

Field.name: TaxIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned to a purchaser (buyer, orderer) by a taxing jurisdiction (state, county, etc.); often called a tax exemption number or certificate number

Field.name: AssignedIdentification
Field.comment: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

SyntaxNote.name: R020306
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of TXI02, TXI03 or TXI06 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either TXI04 or TXI05 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0803
SyntaxNote.comment: If TXI08 is present, then TXI03 is required.
